place_description: Heist Brewery and Barrel Arts is the second location for Charlotte based Heist Brewery. Featuring a spacious taproom that will be utilized to feature small batch barrel aged offerings, as well as primary brews such as CitraQuench'l and Blurred is the Word. We also are the home of Livy's Neapolitan Pizzeria, open every day that Barrel Arts is. Come enjoy a beer or two, grab a pizza, and relax.

reviews_data.review_text: Went for a private event. Pizza was good.
Live music outside. They have some of the best pizza as well. Great spot for a gathering and plenty of room outside for kids and pups to play
Cool space with a great outside area for kids to run around!

Great brewery. The staff was very friendly, knowledgeable and helpful. Service was excellent. The beers were very good, slot of IPA Style. The food we got pretzels and beer cheese and pizza bits were very good, especially the beer cheese. Definitely recommend visiting this brewery for beer and food.
Great food, delicious beer, friendly service, and comfortable seating.

We used heist barrel and arts venue for our welcome party the day before our wedding. We were so impressed with the venue, food and staff. We highly recommend them as an event space in the Charlotte area!
Great atmosphere with lots of young families enjoying open field.   The pizza was excellent and the beer was equally great.
I love the beer.  Ordered a 12 dollar Italian sandwich and it was sooo small and flavorless.
Stopped by while passing through Charlotte with our dogs.  Dog friendly / family friendly.  The food was great (I had a Gyro, best one I've ever eaten).  The beer was fantastic.  Highly recommend.
Dang good chicken wings!  Cool outdoor stage and views of the city!
It was very good. We got to try a few samples of beer before committing to a full size. And the pizza was delicious.

Beer selection had something for everyone. The blueberry wheat is a particular favorite for us. The food however leaves a little to be desired. I give the food a solid 4 on a scale of one to ten. The venue is wonderful and has a little something for everyone.
Great beer and music

This is one of our favorite go-to places in the area.  Many Friday and Saturday evenings there is live music outside, when the weather isn't great it is inside.  It's so family friendly so you can still be social with little ones running on the grass.  Great beer options and the food is surprisingly good too.
The food menu doesn't change, and there aren't as many options as the other Heist location in NODA.  However outside the lawn is the attraction for us.  Grab a picnic table or bring a blanket, enjoy the music and being outside.
Great venue to DJ a wedding!!
Nice brewery with an amazing garden for summer!

Sadly disappointed. Been so looking forward to visiting after seeing the website as I'm an avid Stout lover. Unfortunately they only had 1 stout, and it was ok. I guess more releases soon. Hopefully my next opportunity to visit will miraculously cross their schedule at a better time.

Food and beer is great. We recently had our son's 1st birthday party here in the reserved Clint Eastwood wall area, we were  disappointed with the customer service. No one ever came over to check on us/ see if we needed anything the entire 3 hours we were there. We paid our food and beer tab and left.

Great beer and food. Friendly staff. Family and dog friendly Beer garden.
Event space is perfect for our monthly blues events. Beautiful views of the Charlotte skyline.

The staff is fantastic here and their beer always hits the spot! I booked an event for my birthday, Rebecca, Courtney & Tiffany made everything perfect! It was a pleasure working with them all. Cheers!
Nice place to hang out with friends. Good beverages and food. We were there for a concert and had an enjoyable time. The staff is wonderful!

We had a nice experience, we drove from Rock Hill. Pizza was superb and was made quickly. He had a hazy and I had a Brunch Junkie which hit the spot since it was my only coffee fix of the day. This week was tough at work and that pizza and beer was so necessary. If you have not been here m, don't walk ... run ! Also FYI family environment.
Sweet place with plenty of room for kids to play outside while parents are enjoying Westcoast and New England IPAs inside. My pick: "When the dance gets hot"
Great atmosphere, and Pizza! We're going to try something else on the menu, next time.
I LOVE this Brewery! The beer selection is fantastic and delicious! The pizza was also super tasty! I can't wait to go back!
Pizza is fantastic and a great place to make your children play ball outside on the patio
Pizza is amazing and a beautiful atmosphere

We had our wedding and reception here this past weekend. Heist was incredibly accommodating and everyone working that afternoon was amazing. There were some minor hiccups, but overall could not have asked for a smoother experience. Tiffany was a joy to work with. We will definitely be lifetime customers.

The beer is world-class with both bold and understated beers, all well crafted.
The venue is cool and unique but often can be very crowded with families and their young children. Hey, I have kids of my own, but if you're looking for a quieter time to visit, when they first open is your best bet.
Enjoyed the variety of beer and the food.  Good atmosphere.
Awesome spot with plenty of beer options and excellent pizza and wings!
You guys Rock! We always enjoy Friday nights there and thank you for helping me out with our dinner situation ! Valentine's Dinner was a hit!!!!

Love Heist Brewery and Barrel Arts in Charlotte, North Carolina. They really have a beautiful sowfe with tons of outdoor seating and dog friendly! The inside is super cool too. They have so many amazing selections of beer every time I go. I also saw they have a whiskey list as well too. They have food, but we went on a Monday so there wasn't any available. Can't wait to go back!!
The pizza has good flavor. Wish I told them to make it crispy. Lots of beers to choose from. Friendly staff big area nice huge outdoor area outside for kids to run around
Good beer and food (the pizza is amazing). Wide selection of IPAs. They have TVs, so it's a good brewery to watch football at.

When I asked a bartender for a beer suggestion, she simply stated she didn't drink beer, and severely struggled coming up with anything when asked for suggestions. A part of being in the service industry is knowing your product, even if it's something you don't partake in. The food has been hit and miss lately, between things coming out cold or very burnt and them being out of certain items. It's a nice atmosphere but definitely gets overrun by children on the weekends.

Excellent spot for beers and snacks. Mostly IPAs which is a bit disappointing but still plenty of choices. The pizza was fantastic. Loved the "off the beaten path" location and the ambiance and outdoor space.

Great beer, fantastic pizza, incredible atmosphere.

0 out of 5 stars for the use of all plastic cups. It's 2022, completely unacceptable unsustainable practice.

Will change to 5 stars as soon as the plastic cups disappear.
Wonderful pizza and service! Great beer as we now expect from Heist.
Love Heist - great beer and atmosphere
Great setup, delicious food, awesome music, cool art and welcoming people...what more would you ask for?
Amazing pizza, friendly bar staff, cool venue
Beautiful setting.  More peoplel should check it out
Always a great atmosphere and a great time. Great selections on brews that rarely disappoint. The staff is helpful and friendly, which is great.
Great Brewery and cool environment!  I had some of the best pizza that I've ever had here too!
Great atmosphere,  great beer, BEST pizza we have had in a long time!

Beer was good. Didn't try the food but it looked and smelled appealing. Disappointed with the fact that no barrel aged beers are currently on tap. Will try again next time we pass through this way. general faculty maintenance (I.e. restrooms) could be improved.
Great. Venue and music.
Great selection.  Not too many flavors to confuse you, but enough for various options.  Food was great!!
Neat brewery off on its own. Pizza was really good. I'm sure there is a rotating selection of beers. The time of going, only one appealed to me out of at the 20 or so I saw up there. Will be back.

One of my absolute favorite places in town. Good for beer. Good for kids. And some of the best pizza too.

Can't beat heist!
Nice place for a pint, clean with indoor/ outdoor seating. Food is ok for quick bite, nice beer menu.
Excellent venue. Beautiful environment.
Really nice campus. Very chill relaxing atmosphere. The brewery is new and very attractive to the eyes. Great family atmosphere. Very casual, plenty of parking and seating.
Nice spot for function or to relax after work.
Great place for music and beer.
Some of the best Pizza in clt at this location, the crust is amazingly good. They always deliver with great beer as well - great hazy ipa's.
Nachos and drinks were delicious. The service was not as strong as I would prefer especially for a slow mid-week night. I'll definitely go back.
This place is huge and great for events if you looking for an  indoor n outdoor space. Love the fancy Clint Eastwood painting in the main bar.
Great open area for hanging out. And excellent brews
Perfect
Great staff, venue and elegance

Was super impressed by the beer selection including Vitamin Sea & Garageast. Tried their IPA Citraquench'l and was pleasantly surprised. Beer cheese and pretzels was delightful. They had a photographer taking pictures of their other food and the pizza looked delicious! Will definitely get one next time

Looking at Heist to host my daughter's first birthday party and everyone there has been so friendly and helpful.  Loved that private rooms and food was delish. Shout out to the bartender Lindsay I will make sure to ask my guests to tip you well lol
Loved the property and grounds, very relaxing and inviting. Helpful friendly staff. Definitely a repeat stop when I'm back in town.
Pizza is sooooo good.
Tap room manager has serious anger issues

Great food, good beer selection and pricing. Two stars for visibility to a glaring issue: the men's room has no changing table! Women's does and there is no family restroom. This is ridiculous in 2021

Heist always has very good beers.. I love the location.  The pizza we got there was amazing. It is a beautiful place.  My only wish is that they had more covered areas outside. We like bringing our dogs but when it is raining there is no room.

The mango shrimp tacos we're awesome! I would definitely order them again! They were FULL of shrimp! The service was quick and the employees were so nice and helpful. They had plenty of indoor and outdoor seating.
Beautiful venue, awesome staff and our spades tournament was a success because of all these things
Great food, really nice atmosphere, and attentive service. I will be coming back.
Cool place and atmosphere. Nice vibe. Great food and beer
Great beer and atmosphere.  The food on the other hand,  was extremely too salty.  Would go again, just not for the food.
EXCELLENT!!!
Great beer and great atmosphere, when they get liquor it's a wrap
I thought it was a good environment. But their website shows the wrong location when you go to the menu, so it caused a bunch of confusion. This location doesn't have cocktails and limited food.
Love the pizza
Go see SAM!!!! He's amazing!!
Great beer
Me and my friends come here all the time and the food/drinks are always good. Get a pizza and try one of their sours!
Excellent beer, we love the atmosphere
Love their sours!
Great food and beer good place for a family outing
Food as good as the original brewery.  The beer selection is really IPA-heavy, but solid choices overall.
Fun brewery with inside bar, an outside yard with chairs, and a separate in music venue with bar.
We went for a wedding shower. They have a nice large space for parties with a bar and nice, large restrooms.
Very large outdoor space. I had quick service but the line got quite long after the live music started. Really good atmosphere, service, and staff.

If you like New England ipa's, this is your spot. Best in Charlotte! Their other beers are excellent also! Oatmeal stout was great as well as their sour, Abstract Harvest. Pizza is also excellent..highly recommended!

Best hazy IPAs in Charlotte! Very family friendly and they also have vegan pizza options in this location 

Will be back soon :)

It's was a great experience with great beers and great food. We were there for the first time and enjoyed the food and live music. We even met a couple guys that made for good conversation while enjoying the local beers. Good times and good environment
Amazing beer selection
They are creating an awesome atmosphere here. I can't wait to go back. I honestly haven't been a Heist fan, but the two barrel aged store they stopped today, bang on! I'm on the Heist-wagon now.

I love this place, its my go to Brewery and Pizza place in CLT.  I have yet have a bad beer here, there signature been Citraquench'l is on point, it so good that it gets sold out throughout the year.  The staff is always welcoming and very hard working. They are always ready to help out as soon as you walk in the door either to pour samples or recommend any new arrivals to their menu.  There is nothing better than grabbing a pizza from Livy's Pizzeria (its part of Heist) and perfect brew to enjoy this brewery.  Best of all is their out door space, its huge, plenty spread out over the grassy/ picnic area.  This will be my go to spot for long time to come, if you see me come say hi.

Last Friday I ordered pizza to go and when i got home I saw that it was over cooked.
Good beer and nice place but I am sure they saw how the pizza came after the oven but they still gave it to us.
Please check your pizza before take it home.
This place is like willy Wonka but for beer. So many beer concoctions it's hard to resist. And they have wood oven pizza (livys pizza.)
I seriously if you're a beer fan and you want to try a great variety then you owe it to yourself to get here. Tons of space and a huge variety on tap!
Great food and drinks

Great food, great beer, lots of space inside and especially outside. Really great outdoor stage area with lots of space around the picnic tables outside. Such a great spot for relaxing and listening to good music.
Cool store

Heist hosted our Halloween event last night and it was incredible. The staff really made event special and the food was amazing. The space was perfect for our needs and everyone in attendance had an amazing time. Thanks so much for helping us make the night one we will remember for the rest of our lives!
Great brews and now great pizzas.
I've been to New York a couple times and their pizza is spot on to a Brooklyn style pizza. Service, food, and beer was spectacular. Would definitely recommend.
This place had become my new hangout spot. I love that they practice social distancing.

We LOVE this spot. Heist has amazing beers and now with the addition of the Pizza, this is a great all in one stop. The space is great and we love sitting outside and letting our toddler run around. The inside is spacious and cool with an industrial vibe and an awesome mural. We actually live in Harrisburg and this is such a nice brewery that is a short drive away, that we come here often.

Hands down one of the best places to get pizza in Charlotte! I don't drink beer but I definitely love to eat. The pizza has the freshest ingredients that ignites wonderful flavors in every bite. I don't know about anyone else but if you eat something and the after taste is amazing too... THAT'S A WINNER FOR THE TASTE BUDS! Outdoor seating allows for great social distancing. We need you'll to open for lunch so I can get my pizza fix earlier
Mostly IPA

Great staff. Really going above and beyond during covid times with free delivery of food from their noda location. Very tasty and surprisingly quick considering they it's delivered. Obviously using top quality ingredients. Beer tenders are very knowledgeable and willing to offer suggestions. Tuesday yoga and trivia make for a great night out. Fantastic outdoor space dog friendly. Relaxed atmosphere/ neighborhood Hangout
Absolutely beautiful building with a wide range of beers on tap.<3
Great spot. Lots of outdoor seating options for our spring and summer weather. The kitchen was still being built. Tasty beer and friendly staff!

We went on a Monday evening to show a friend from out of town a local brewery and restaurant. We were seated right away on the patio and given a craft of water. We waited 10 to 15 minutes before our server even acknowledged our presence and ordered two beers and a flight.

By this time we had gone through two crafts of water. The server came back to take our order and we still didn't have our drinks and were out of water.  After our server left we had to flag down another server to ask about our drink orders and were told "our bartender is busy."

After 30 minutes our food arrived piecemeal with one entree being dropped off at a time. I asked why our appetizer hadn't arrived and I was told it was on it's way. After another 10 minutes all of our food had been dropped off and we still didn't have our drink orders.  Our appetizer finally arrived after we had begun to eat our entrees.

About five minutes later two of our beers showed up but no flight to which we were given the same excuse of "the bartender is busy."  The flight eventually arrived with our absentee server who asked how everything was going. She left all of our menus on the table to further clutter everything up and then disappeared for another 30 minutes.

The service at Heist is terrible. We waited for most of our visit with no drinks or food. The only reason I'm giving them two stars and not one is because their food was good.

There are many other bars, restaurants, and breweries in the NoDa area; I suggest you hit any one of them before considering this dump.

Certainly a spacious new addition to the Heist Brewery portfolio with a large special events space too. If you want to beat the crowds of original location try here. Beers of course are solid as always, but no crowlers/ growler fills and no food. A little off the beaten track. Bartenders knowledgeable and friendly.
Cool vibe, shaky neighborhood
Great beer selection and great environment!! Will be going back soon!
Great place anyone would like this spot.
What a great spot!  They even have yoga on Tuesday at 6:30 for $10 and you get a beer with it!
Always great service, great variety of , safe place...(MO-J) please don't run out...it's an excellent
Great place to relax with good beer.

If the new Heist Brewery Barrel Room location isn't on your "must-try" list of trendy places to visit in Charlotte, well it should be.

The service is great and the space is even better! The vibe is always great and the music/food truck selection has been on point every time we've been. You've got to try it out.

Oh and we didn't even mention their selection of brews... excellent.

Great variety of styles, all very good. Location is great also, the building is like new, a lot of outdoor space. Bartenders were very friendly and helpful. I would like to visit again before I leave NC.
Plenty of room, open air brewery.
Very family oriented! Liked the atmosphere more than in the other location.
Great space, family friendly and the bartenders are really helpful with suggesting beers. All the beers we've had have been amazing.
I just left the Align event there. Atmosphere was great! Food was even better! Their beer cheese dip was so good along with their pulled pork.
Beautiful new spot. Great beer, awesome atmosphere, and kid friendly.
Awesome awesome awesome
My new favorite hangout!
